actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution recognizing the Ellis Island Medal of Honor and commending the National Ethnic Coalition of Organizations.

summary.text: Recognizes the Ellis Island Medal of Honor for acknowledging individuals who live exemplary lives as Americans while preserving the values of their particular ethnic groups. Commends the National Ethnic Coalition of Organizations for its sponsorship of the Ellis Island Medal of Honor and ongoing work to promote harmony and understanding between groups.

titles.title: A resolution recognizing the Ellis Island Medal of Honor and commending the National Ethnic Coalition of Organizations.
